programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Gila Tak Cinta

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Scoop
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.

programme.title: Hello Itu Bff I
programme.desc: Selepas menamatkan pelajaran di luar negara, seorang wanita muda pulang ke tanah air dengan perasaan tidak sabar ingin bertemu bff tersayangnya. Namun kehadiran BFF baharu dalam kehidupan kawannya telah menimbulkan rasa cemburu dan bengang dalam dirinya. dia mencuba pelbagai helah untuk memisahkan mereka dan akibatnya berlaku pergaduhan antara dia dan sahabat baru kawannya

programme.title: Mama Oh Mama
programme.desc: Seorang perempuan yang berperwatakan liar sering melakukan perkara yang tidak dipersetujui oleh ibu bapanya . Dia sering mengunjungi kelab malam dan keluar bersama teman lelakinya . Walaupun dinasihati oleh orang gajinya, perempuan itu tetap tidak berubah sikap.

programme.title: Jom Wayang S12 Ep13
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Gina dan Jo yang bertemu secara tak sengaja dan berpakat untuk memastikan Hardy dan Nita tak jadi berkahwin dengan bantuan dua lagi rakan mereka iaitu Lola dan Tompy.

programme.title: Kanta Serigala
programme.desc: seorang abang yang cuba membalas dendam atas kematian adiknya. Adiknya seorang remaja berbakat berkeinginan untuk menjadi seorang penyanyi terkenal dan berpengaruh seperti penyanyi pujaannya telah menjadi mangsa penipuan, diperkosa dan dibunuh dua lelaki yang menyamar kakitangan syarikat rakam

programme.title: Gila Gusti
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat, Mamat dan Zul, obses terhadap gusti dan mengidolakan ahli gusti tempatan terkenal bernama Naga. Apabila Naga tewas dalam perlawanan besarnya dan patah semangat untuk terus bergusti, Mamat dan Zul nekad untuk membantu idola mereka mencari semula semangat yang hilang demi memenangi semua kejuaraan gusti Asia Pasifik.

programme.title: Tmo Gila Tak Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Gila Tak Cinta

programme.title: Jodoh Express
programme.desc: Maya, seorang ketua agensi mencari jodoh yang berusaha menyatukan pelanggan-pelanggannya dengan gadis atau jejaka idaman mereka. Suatu hari, agensi mereka telah didatangi seorang pelanggan wanita, Ros yang ingin menggunakan perkhidmatan mereka untuk memikat seorang gadis bernama Qalisha untuk adik lelakinya, Akmal. Namun, tanpa disangka rupa-rupanya Akmal adalah lelaki yang disukai oleh Maya dalam diam.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep12
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Datin Glam
programme.desc: Kisah Nona yang ke Kuala Lumpur untuk menjaga sepupunya, Datin Ros yang sedang sakit tenat. Datin Ros berhajat untuk suaminya Datuk Kamal mengahwini Nona sekiranya dia tidak ada lagi.

programme.title: Merah
programme.desc: Tiga sahabat ini pada asalnya berkiblatkan pada kebenaran dan kesucian, tetapi atas cabaran suratan nasib, mereka berubah mengambil jalan singkat untuk mengubah hidup mereka . Mereka bertiga melakukan satu rompakan nekad untuk membantu nenek salleh yang terlantar di hospital, yang memerlukan wang yang banyak untuk mendapatkan rawatan pakar

programme.title: Udah Go Publik Tapi Masih Shy Shy Cat
programme.desc: Nenek Adit suruh Adit dan Raya kahwin. Mereka berpura-pura bersetuju pada awalnya, tetapi mereka jatuh cinta dari masa ke masa.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep51
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep10
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Cinta Misteri Ep37
programme.desc: Seorang gadis bernama Kinanti yang baru berpindah ke Jakarta dan bersekolah di sekolah antarabangsa. Walaupun ada orang yang tidak menyukainya, dia berkawan dengan ramai pelajar. Kinanti juga berkawan dengan seorang gadis bernama Dinda. Rupanya, Dinda adalah hantu yang menetap di sekolah itu. Sejak itu, Kinanti dan rakannya sering berurusan dengan hantu. Sering kali mereka mengalami pengembaraan menarik yang berkaitan dengan dunia mistik.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep39
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep52
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Doa Ibu Terzalimi Menuntun Anak Yang Lupa Diri Untuk Bertaubat
programme.desc: Puan Manik sudah tua dan tidak boleh lagi bekerja sebagai buruh di pasar. Anak lelaki Puan Manik, Andi, bekerja sebagai penunggang teksi motosikal. Namun, dia tidak meringankan kehidupan ibunya. Dia memaksa ibunya mencari lebih banyak wang supaya dia dapat memenuhi hasrat gaya hidup isterinya, Vita.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep73
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Pop Academy Ep24
programme.desc: Pop Academy adalah arena pencarian bakat muzik pop terbesar di Indonesia yang mencari bakat muda Indonesia yang mempunyai suara emas dalam menyanyikan genre muzik pop dan bersedia menjadi bintang. Dengan tagline "Be Pop Academy and Be A Super Stars", Pop Academy bertujuan untuk mencari idola baru dalam dunia muzik pop Indonesia.

programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Anak Buta Mata Yang Menjadi Satu-Satunya Permata Dalam Keluarga
programme.desc: Mima, anak berkeperluan khas, menjadi tulang belakang keluarga. Dia menjual keropok untuk rawatan ibunya bernama, Lastri. Pada suatu hari, Mima telah difitnah kerana melakukan kecurian dengan mengambil dompet di dalam kereta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep74
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. programme.title: Jejak Misteri Ep11
programme.desc: Jejak Misteri ialah sebuah rancangan realiti bergenre misteri di mana setiap episod menyajikan liputan pelbagai tempat, bangunan dan tapak bersejarah yang bukan sahaja menyimpan kisah-kisah bersejarah, malah turut meninggalkan kisah-kisah mistik.

programme.title: Di Sebelah Ada Surga Ep11
programme.desc: Di Sebelah Ada Surga menceritakan tentang 3 pemuda iaitu Andika, Gading, dan Uus. Kehidupan rohaniah mereka dikatakan masih kurang. Masa muda mereka telah diisikan dengan santai tanpa mempedulikan masa depan. Mereka sibuk mengejar keseronokan duniawi yang tipikal dari golongan belia hari ini.

programme.title: Suami Hanya Mau Bersama Saat Suka, Bukan Dalam Susah
programme.desc: Fandy memilih untuk meninggalkan isterinya Hana dan lebih memilih Mila demi kehidupan yang bahagia, daripada tinggal bersama Hana.

programme.title: Aku Istri Tak Pernah Punya Hak Layaknya Seorang Istri
programme.desc: Tergoda dengan kekayaan, Arina akhirnya berkahwin dengan Aldo. Namun, siapa sangka, Aldo bukanlah jejaka yang dibayangkan oleh Arina.

programme.title: Sayang Gue Khusus Cuma Buat Pengguna Baru
programme.desc: Sekiranya anda mempunyai hutang, anda perlu membayarnya dengan segera. Tari sedang mencari jalan keluar dari masalah hutangnya. Pekerjaannya sebagai seorang gadis pejabat tidak akan cukup untuk membayar hutangnya. Adakah Bian akan membantu meringankan bebannya?

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep75
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Juragan 11 Ep59
programme.desc: Juragan 11 mempersembahkan hiburan dengan sajian komedi segar baharu, yang dimeriahkan oleh bintang tetamu terkenal Indonesia.

programme.title: Our School's E.T.
programme.desc: Seong Geun is content with being a P.E teacher, but the school wants to sack him in favor for an English teacher. To survive, he must teach English - but he doesn't speak a word of it.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss after an accident, Soo-jin begins to see eerie visions of murderous events. She grows suspicious of her husband after seeing a vision of him killing their neighbor…

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: The Map Against The World
programme.desc: After his father dies due to an erroneous map, Kim Jeong-Ho sets out to make an accurate map of Joseon.

programme.title: The Classified File
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a fortune teller form an unlikely partnership in order to rescue a kidnapped child before it's too late.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: In order to catch a gangster, a cop goes undercover as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: Commitment
programme.desc: When a North Korean spy infiltrates South Korea as a teenage defector, the South Korean government begin tracking him while his own government sends a vicious assassin to eliminate him.

programme.title: Possessed
programme.desc: Hee-jin returns home from college to find her missing sister. During the investigation, she hears that her sister had been possessed and her neighbors who knew her sister begin dying one by one…

programme.title: Believer
programme.desc: A police detective determined to catch the unseen boss of Asia's biggest drug cartel joins hands with a revenge-thirsty member of the gang.

programme.title: C'Est Si Bon
programme.desc: The story of three young musicians formed a band after a music bar named ‘C’est Si Bon’, where they bicker over their music and find their muse.

programme.title: Emergency Declaration
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths on plane forced the pilot to call for an unconditional emergency landing.

programme.title: My Girlfriend Is An Agent
programme.desc: A secret agent couple goes behind each other’s backs, unknowingly on the same mission to stop a Russian organized crime ring from stealing an advanced bio-chemical weapon.

programme.title: The Closet
programme.desc: After losing his wife, a father tries to start over in a new home with his daughter. But things take a turn when strange noises trickle out of the closet, and his daughter goes missing.

programme.title: Salut D'Amour
programme.desc: Follow the heart-warming tale about a pair of elderly people who, with the support of family and friends, find love despite their failing minds and weakening bodies.

programme.title: Jazzy Misfits
programme.desc: A jazz singer goes on a day trip with her estranged mother in search of her younger sister. The two start to discover a different side to each other as they roam around in Seoul.

programme.title: Gang
programme.desc: Choi Ji-hoon pledges to be the ‘top gangster’ at Daehun High School by joining their underground fight club and fighting his way to the top – no matter the cost.

programme.title: My Sassy Girl
programme.desc: A young man sees a drunk, cute woman standing too close to the tracks at a metro station in Seoul and pulls her back. She ends up getting him into trouble repeatedly after that, starting on the train.

programme.title: The Goblin
programme.desc: After ten years in jail, Doohyun is released and wants nothing more than to live an ordinary life, but when his old partner kidnaps his daughter, the long-hidden Goblin inside him awakes.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: A music teacher was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Midnight Runners
programme.desc: Two students from Korean National Police University decide to work together and track down a kidnapping incident.

programme.title: By Quantum Physics: A Nightlife Venture
programme.desc: A nightclub owner, his club manager and a police officer must wash their hands off a drug abuse case that involves high-profile figures, in order to save their own lives.

programme.title: Fabricated City
programme.desc: When an online gamer is framed for a murder, a hacker tries to uncover the truth behind the murder case and help clear his name.

programme.title: Ditto
programme.desc: A voice from the future echoes through an antique radio connects the two living 20 years apart and changed Yong's life forever.

programme.title: China News
programme.desc: It concentrates on the latest news and social changes happening in china and all over the world

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep927928
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep29204541
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1990
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3544
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1032
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3357
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45424543
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1032
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep931932
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep45424543
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2563
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1032
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep38
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Way to Health(M) Ep177178
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about one’s health.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep431
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Let’s Go Crazy on LIVE!(M) Ep45
programme.desc: As an ordinary girl, working an ordinary job, at an ordinary convenience store, Lin An An had only one dream in life: to find a good, stable, government job so she could support her aging grandfather. With that single dream in mind, An An never even thought of becoming anything more than the ordinary girl she had always been. But all that changed the day You Yuan Le walked into her life.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran, Wu Wei and an undercover cop, Tian Ming lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok. As they are about to leave after the rescue, Wu finds that his daughter is also kidnapped, and decides to stay on with Ming to fight the thugs and save her.

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: Love is Cold
programme.desc: In the mid-1990s in Macau, a teenage boy and girl kill someone and clean up the crime scene together. The girl is from China and is bullied in her new school. The boy is from a complicated family who has close ties to the gangster world. They are instantly attracted to each other when they met but who did they kill and will they get away with it?

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: A casino PR in Macau receives a classic novel “84, Charing Cross Road”. She sends back the novel with a letter to where it came from as she does not like it. A real estate agent in California receives the novel and as it does not belong to him, he sends it back with a letter as well. The two form a relationship after all the back and forth.

programme.title: Queen of Triads
programme.desc: An innocent young girl named Zuo Lan attempts to commit suicide after she was betrayed by her boyfriend. However, she is saved by a gangster boss called Zui Ge. In order to exact her revenge, Zuo Lan joins force with Zui Ge and becomes a top mobster…

programme.title: Legend of the Naga Pearls
programme.desc: A thief and a constable team up to save humanity from creatures known as the Winged Tribe, who lost their power of flight centuries ago after their war against mankind. They are hell-bent on seeking revenge by obtaining a mystical artifact called the Naga Pearls.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Shanghai
programme.desc: Ma Yongzhen (Philip Ng) and Lung Chat (Andy On) are renowned after taking down the Axe Gang, the largest triad gang in Shanghai. Ma is also helped by a kung fu master, the Iron Leader (Sammo Hung), to fight against their enemy. Being defeated, the Axe Gang holds a grudge and kills Lung. Ma, after watching his brother die, decides to take revenge.

programme.title: Defying Chase
programme.desc: A stunt man is inadvertently caught in a criminal operation involving culture relics hustling, and has to fight for himself in a series of dangerous adventures.

programme.title: 3Ft Ball and Souls
programme.desc: Members of an internet suicide room called Life Club decide to end their lives using explosives. But every time the fireworks explode, they find themselves back-in-time before they carried out their plan. They suspect the cause of this mystery to be the young age of one of the members and tries to convince the high school girl to quit…

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriend’s wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge – will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Divergence
programme.desc: Three men are going beyond what their jobs require them to do. An ill-fated police detective runs into a woman during his investigation on a money laundering case, a lawyer protects a corrupt businessman from law and a ruthless killer violates his code to get involved in a police investigation. These three men are thrown together by circumstance...

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: My Prince Edward
programme.desc: A newly engaged Hong Kong woman tries to rid herself of a secret sham marriage to a mainlander that she was paid for years ago, before she can get married for real. Winner of Best Original Film Score and Best New Director at the 39th Hong Kong Film Awards.

programme.title: Naked Soldier
programme.desc: When Interpol agent Long busted a billion-dollar drug deal 15 years ago, the cartel took revenge and killed his family. The cartel boss, Madame Rose, even kidnaps and raises Long’s daughter, Phoenix, to become a skilled assassin. Only when Phoenix is about to kill Long did she discover the startling fact about her true identity…

programme.title: Cherie
programme.desc: Cherie Chung plays the title character in this sexy romance as a fitness instructor who attracts the attentions of a wealthy businessman and a handsome photographer.

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A London businessman whose teenage daughter dies in a terrorist attack is determined to take revenge. His relentless search for the terrorists leads to a conflict with a British government official whose own past may hold the clues to identify the elusive killers.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Wo Hu
programme.desc: The Hong Kong Police has placed more than a thousand undercover officers in various triad groups to bring down the largest criminal organization in Hong Kong. Betrayal, deceit and murder bring this group of "brothers" into a collision with the law and with each other!

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Heng is a high school student whose mother abandoned the family eight years ago. You Mei is a teacher whose husband is having an affair. When You Mei becomes a temporary teacher at Heng's school, the two lonely souls develop a forbidden love.

programme.title: The White Storm
programme.desc: Three Narcotics Bureau officers who are good friends get involved in a case with the drug lord. When the operation fails, they must make a devastating decision - two can live, but one must die. Five years later, the two vow to take revenge but end up competing against each other for their own lives. Will brotherhood be sacrificed again?

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: The Captain
programme.desc: The movie is based on a real incident of Sichuan Airlines Flight 8633 on 14 May 2018. When the cockpit windshield shatters after takeoff, the Captain manages to land the airplane safely with his level-headed swift actions and sheer determination. This is lauded as a miracle in airline history.

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: Buddha's Palm
programme.desc: In the arsenal of classic martial arts secret weapons, there is none more lethal than the Buddha's Palm, a technique by which an ordinary hand is transformed into a formidable force. Ku, a blind recluse living in a cave, knows its secret, which proves to be as much a blessing as a curse as it attracts all manner of mayhem...

programme.title: Hong Kong Rhapsody
programme.desc: Hong Kong rhapsody is a musical extravaganza full of song and dance! Peter Chen-Ho stars as a playboy magician who changes his ways after he becomes the guardian of a young singer (Li Ching), the daughter of a deceased magician friend.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her master’s Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fan’s daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fan’s friend along the way.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again…

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called “The Venoms”, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Hui’s husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and cause her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: The Duel of the Century
programme.desc: In the mid-1980's Chu Yuan became internationally famous for starring as the nasty villain in Jackie Chan's groundbreaking worldwide hit, POLICE STORY. But for more than twenty-five years, he was famous as one of Hong Kong’s most respected directors of "Martial-art World" epics — often conceived by his remarkable collaborator, novelist Ku Lung. This was one of their last together for the Shaw Brothers Studio, but it's another revenge and mystery-tinged winner. Liu Yung and Sun Chien (the Korean kicking THE FIVE VENOM from Chang Cheh's internationally popular series) team to investigate the martial-art murders of a supposedly mortally wounded swordsman, only to find deception, double-dealings, imposters, and one deadly duel after another. No less than three choreographers are on hand to handle the multitude of martial arts, making this one of Chu Yuan's most involving and exciting efforts ever.

programme.title: The Cave of Silken Web
programme.desc: In this third instalment of Shaw Brother’s Journey to the West, Monk Tang San Zang (Ho Fan) is trapped by seven seductive spiders, hell-bent on achieving immortality by eating him! Monkey (Chou Lung Chang), Pigsy (Peng Peng) and Sha Wu Jing (Tien Shun) have to fight with the spiders to rescue Monk Tang San Zang.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fiancé, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like…

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiancée suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiancée accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: The Boxer From The Temple
programme.desc: A young monk, The Kid, was expelled from the temple due to his crazy ways. After leaving the temple, he fights a cruel bandit's son and befriends a prostitute. As he fights for justice, his “Crazy Lo Han Fist” improves with every fight.

programme.title: Mist Over Dream Lake
programme.desc: A young girl Chen is sent away by her parents who are going through divorce, to stay with the Chang’s. On the Chang’s farm, she meets their two sons, the youngest daughter and a young artist, and spends a summer with them that she will never forget.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The "Venoms" were no more. After five years and more than a dozen films together, the only one of the original five who proved so successful for the director was the muscleman Lo Meng. But with just that one "venom" and his incredibly agile new star Cheng Tien-chi, he made this spectacular, internationally popular, favorite. Evil ninjas (who attack with, and from, fire, sun, wood, water, and the ground) brutally slaughter a noble Chinese kung-fu school's students. The one survivor finds a teacher and four students who are ninjitsu experts. The five graduates take revenge. With this strong structure and exceptional kung-fu choreography (from the star and co-star Chu Ke), Chang Cheh produced platinum. This film was one of the director's best of his superheroic, grand guignol period. By any name, it could be called, almost literally, "bloody good" entertainment!

programme.title: The Blue and the Black Part 2
programme.desc: Continuing from the first movie, Tang Qi ends her career as a nightclub singer and starts searching battle-scarred China for her lover Chang, who is now entangled with Japanese invaders, communist insurgents, and a warlord's beautiful daughter.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fiancé. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: Judgement of an Assassin
programme.desc: An evil clan plans a discord so as to dominate the martial arts world. Their masked assassins massacre another clan and one of the assassins is arrested and brought to trial at a tribunal of all the clans. What judgement will they make and can they uncover the truth?

programme.title: Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers?
programme.desc: Jenny Hu, Shaw Brothers' gorgeous Chinese-German star, was given her first comedy role in the wild and wacky Guess Who Killed My Twelve Lovers? Described as "a comedy of belly laughs and chilling murders", it is a unique entry in the Hong Kong theater of the absurd.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lin’s husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: Ying Tai disguises herself as a boy to go to school and falls hopelessly in love with her classmate, Shan Bo. After Shan Bo realizes her true identity, he proposes marriage to Ying Tai. However, as she is engaged to another man, they are kept apart. Knowing Shan Bo died in despair, Ying Tai is in deep sorrow and kills herself at his grave.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Tao’s real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: Melody of Love
programme.desc: Three young doctors pursue three hard-to-get beauties in this romantic film set in the 70s “a-go-go” era. They have no idea where to start and use Rock-paper-scissor method to match themselves with the girls. The tactics and tricks they use are hilarious and they have to reshuffle their plans when nothing leads to success!

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: The martial arts world is plunged into terror when a mysterious figure known as the 'Embroidery Bandit' starts to attack convoys of precious materials. Seemingly unstoppable, the frightened clans decide to call on the expertise of Lu Xiao Feng, an inquisitive fighter and detective to capture the culprit.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Lady General Hua Mu-Lan
programme.desc: Mulan disguises herself as a male soldier to replace her aged father in a war against the barbarians. Her courage brings her victory in battles and she was promoted to a general. When Mulan returns home with glory, the chief commander asks her to marry his daughter, forcing Mulan to reveal her true identity.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father’s death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the “Toad Stance” and accidentally unveils his true identity…

programme.title: Oru Pakka Kathai
programme.desc: Meera and Saravanan fall in love with each other and decide to get married after completing their education. However, their lives turn upside down when she gets pregnant while still being a virgin.

programme.title: Mannar Vageyra
programme.desc: Madhi helps his brother Arivu unite with the love of his life, which causes trouble between the families. When Madhi tells his parents about the woman he loves, they disapprove of his relationship.

programme.title: Idhu Ennoda Jilla
programme.desc: Veera loses his father in a village fight arising out of a long-standing rivalry. Can he avenge his father's death and put an end to the violence?

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: India Pakistan
programme.desc: Two aspiring lawyers, Karthick and Mellina, not knowing that both are of the same profession, share an office due to financial problems. Things take a turn when they work on the same case.

programme.title: Ainthu Ainthu Ainthu
programme.desc: Aravind unexpectedly loses his beloved girlfriend in a car accident. The strangest thing happens after the accident when people around him tell him no such person ever existed.

programme.title: Kavan
programme.desc: A TV journalist goes against the orders of his corrupt and dishonest boss and helps a group of youngsters in their fight against a pesticide factory.

programme.title: Killadi Marumagan
programme.desc: The son of an egoistic businessman falls in love with an egoistic girl and has to convince her egoistic mother in order to marry her.

programme.title: Sethupathy
programme.desc: While conducting an investigation into the mysterious death of a fellow officer, a cop's own reputation is questioned when a suspect in his custody is shot.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Anandam Vilayadum Veedu
programme.desc: While Muthupandi and Kaasi, two half-brothers, lead harmonious lives with their large families, their formidable unity is threatened by the evil scheme of an old nemesis.

programme.title: Stalin
programme.desc: The story is about how an ex-army officer brings change in society by making people to help each other.

programme.title: Geethanjali
programme.desc: James, a Hindu orphan, is raised by Lawrence, a Catholic priest. Diana, a rich and arrogant woman, falls for him. Since he loves Julie, he's caught in a dilemma when Lawrence urges him to marry Diana.

programme.title: Kamali From Nadukaveri
programme.desc: Kamali From Nadukkaveri embraces the Power and the Importance of Education for Women. Born as a Girl Child in a village called Nadukkaveri, How Kamali becomes the identity of the same village is what this film is all about.

programme.title: Market Raja Mbbs (3 Hrs)
programme.desc: An arrogant don is possessed by the ghost of a medical college student and turns meek. Now his accomplices expect the return of the actual don.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Kolamavu Kokila
programme.desc: Kokila, who has financial issues, gets involved in a drug racket to earn quick money. Eventually, her family also gets dragged in the internal drug war which, in turn, puts their lives at risk.

programme.title: Adhe Kangal (Abhishek)
programme.desc: What begins as a love triangle morphs into a thriller, following an accident - and an abduction.

programme.title: Kalathil Santhippom
programme.desc: Ashok and Anand are best friends in spite of being very different. When Ashok accidentally becomes the reason for a misunderstanding in Anand's wedding procedures, he tries to fix it.

programme.title: Gorilla
programme.desc: Jeeva, Sathish, Venkat and Sadhik join hands in order to rob a bank with a chimpanzee as their accomplice. However, things do not go the way they planned.

programme.title: Vantha Rajavathan Varuven
programme.desc: Aadhi promises his grandfather that he will reunite him with his estranged daughter, Nandhini. Posing as a driver, Aadhi enters Nandhini's house but trouble soon follows.

programme.title: Ismart Shankar
programme.desc: Shankar, a contract killer, manages to escape after murdering a politician. Later, he helps the police find a murderer when an officer's memory is transferred to him.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.desc: East Bowl Rap / West Bowl Rap - Sketches include All-Stars from the East/West bowl rapping, the guys playing mobsters, and the two valet guys having trouble believing anyone would mess with the Batmans.

programme.title: Funniest Adverts on the Planet! (S1) Ep10
programme.desc: Crisps - Comedian Josh Widdicombe is your hilarious and incredulous guide travelling through the worlds of the funniest ever made by poking the methods used by the advertising industry to sell the planet's most popular snack - crisps.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep21
programme.desc: You'll Do - With no memory of the night before, Lasalle's brother, Cade, turns to NCIS for help when he finds his girlfriend's body in the trunk of his car. Lasalle is determined to prove his brother's innocence.

programme.title: The Neighborhood (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Welcome to the Neighborhood - Dave Johnson a friendly guy from the Midwest, moves his family to a Los Angeles neighborhood next door to Calvin Butler, who's concerned the Johnsons will disrupt the culture on the block.

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: The crew of the Federation starship Enterprise is called to Nimbus III, the Planet of Intergalactic Peace. They are to negotiate in a case of kidnapping and found the kidnapper is a relative of Spock.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live (S48) Ep10
programme.desc: Aubrey Plaza / Sam Smith - The host tonight Aubrey Plaza with musical performance by Sam Smith.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans (S1) Ep11
programme.desc: Baitfish - The NCIS team investigates a deadly explosion at the Navy-Marine Corps Relief Gala event they were attending, but further examination reveals Pride was the intended target of the bomb.

programme.title: FBI (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Codename: Ferdinand - When the team digs into the circumstances surrounding a car crash that resulted in the death of a photographer, they realize there is more than meets the eye.

programme.title: 1883 (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Racing Clouds - A misunderstanding leads to a battle with serious consequences.

programme.title: The Great (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: A Pox on Hope - Catherine is feeling optimistic, until a smallpox breakout causes Peter to revert back to his old ways. Meanwhile, Leo and Catherine's relationship suffers and Georgina misses Peter.

programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: In this terrifyingly suspenseful thriller, a family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Humans and Transformers are at war, Optimus Prime is gone. The key to saving our future lies buried in the secrets of the past, in the hidden history of Transformers on Earth.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: After a high-tech, secret weapon is stolen by the mysterious and evil Cobra organization, the G.I. Joes must race against time to stop Cobra from using the weapon and plunging the world into chaos.

programme.title: Mr. Mayor (S2) Ep7
programme.desc: Murder in the Old West - Jayden hosts a Western-themed murder mystery party where Mikaela tries to figure out what's going on between her and James. Arpi and Neil clash over how to spend the city's newly acquired budget surplus.

programme.title: 1883 (S1) Ep9
programme.desc: Racing Clouds - A misunderstanding leads to a battle with serious consequences.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: The world needed a hero, we got a hedgehog. Superpowered with speed, Sonic races to save the world and stop evil genius Dr. Robotnik from world domination.

programme.title: Meet The Wangs
programme.desc: In this hilarious tale of one-upmanship, a German family discovers that their new Chinese neighbours are better than them at everything from school to work to sports. Jealousy soon escalates to full-blown rivalry and then an all-out war.

programme.title: In Love With My Boss
programme.desc: Anna is secretly in love with her boss Sven, who seems to think no more of Anna than a perfect assistant. When Sven decides to pursue love, Anna conceals her affection and plays matchmaker. Yet, her success in the matter leaves her heartbroken.

programme.title: 7 Wishes
programme.desc: Marina loses her passport on the eve of her wedding. When she fails to locate it, she takes to her last resort: a wish marathon. She asks the Universe for seven wishes and soon realises that the best blessings come in disguise.

programme.title: Flesh Out
programme.desc: Aligned to the tradition of Mauritanian culture, young Verida’s impending arranged marriage means that she has to start gavage – a ritual of over-eating in order to gain a voluptuous body. Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.

programme.title: Murders In Lorraine
programme.desc: A corpse clutching a crystal chess piece is found in an old fortress. Lieutenant Muller and a young female intern work on the case. Much to his horror, the clues lead him to his family-owned crystal factory – a legacy he abandoned for his police dream.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: A Song For Mia
programme.desc: Sebastian is a young man living a life of wanton indulgence until an accident blinds him and halts his life abruptly. Mia, a nurse unlike his usual women, enters his life and shows him the beauty of a life he can attain if he follows his true passions.

programme.title: The Boss And The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: Nanny On Board II: In South Africa
programme.desc: Henni, as the premium nanny, finds herself in a South African farm. Her employer is Konrad, a harsh grandfather. However, she soon discovers that beneath his cold exterior is a sensitive man with a wounded heart. She falls for him and things soon unravel.

programme.title: Zagros
programme.desc: In Kurdistan, Zagros’s happy marriage falters when relatives start questioning his wife’s growing modern personality. She soon runs away to Brussels for refuge. He follows her out of love but the burden of tradition and patriarchy never leaves him.

programme.title: In Love With My Boss
programme.desc: Anna is secretly in love with her boss Sven, who seems to think no more of Anna than a perfect assistant. When Sven decides to pursue love, Anna conceals her affection and plays matchmaker. Yet, her success in the matter leaves her heartbroken.

Meal after meal, she feels increasingly estranged from her own body and starts to question her willful obedience to such rules.

programme.title: A Summer In Antwerp
programme.desc: Fashion designer Cara and her grandmother are reuniting with her childhood friend Judith who was forced to flee from Nazi Germany. But when they arrive at Antwerp to see her, it is not Judith who answers the door, but a young man named Mathis.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Rabbit Without Ears
programme.desc: Til Schweiger (Inglorious Bastards) directs and stars in this slick romantic comedy that was number 1 on the German box office in 2007. A reporter is at the mercy of the girl he used to bully in school while serving his probation at a daycare centre.

programme.title: A Song For Mia
programme.desc: Sebastian is a young man living a life of wanton indulgence until an accident blinds him and halts his life abruptly. Mia, a nurse unlike his usual women, enters his life and shows him the beauty of a life he can attain if he follows his true passions.

programme.title: The Mine
programme.desc: An ecocritical film that explores capitalistic greed and environmental destruction. A young civil servant, Jussi, is in charge of the environmental permit of a huge mine. He soon discovers dangerous truths about its operations but his job is on the line.

programme.title: The Boss And The Cutie
programme.desc: Totò is a rising boss of Neopolitan organised crime. Rosetta is a little girl in the fifth grade. After encountering nasty accidents and falling into comas, the both of them wake up in the hospital to find that they are trapped in the other’s body.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Fourth Woman
programme.desc: The body of a woman is found in a hops field suspended like in a spider web, and a swimmer is later run over by a motorboat on the lake. Two police officers are sent to investigate the case and they uncover how the two deaths might be related.

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel
programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parent’s and Irene’s marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.title: A Summer in Iceland
programme.desc: Young Jette flies to Iceland to settle her aunt Rosalie’s ashes in its final resting place. Armed only with Rosalie’s diary, she learns about her aunt’s hidden life of love and survival. Unbeknownst to Jette, her own love story is about to begin too!

programme.title: Patchwork Family
programme.desc: Christian is a divorced father who can only see his young daughter Vanessa every other weekend. When he meets the single mother Christine and decides to participate in a summer TV show, his whole life is turned upside down.

programme.title: The Best Of Dorien B.
programme.desc: 37-year old Dorien seemed to have a perfect life - she has a flourishing veterinary practice, two sweet kids and a successful husband. After everything suddenly fell apart, she must rediscover herself in order to escape the chaos which is now her life.

programme.title: Murder Up North: Sievers And the Black Angel
programme.desc: An attendee of an angel seminar has been found beaten to death. The case becomes personal for Sievers when suspicions fall on fellow participant Hanne Wegener whom he knows from his past. Feldmann has no choice but to conduct the investigation undercover.

programme.title: Catch Of The Day
programme.desc: Alex, a driven young man, is forced to leave Hamburg for his small hometown to care for his sick father. With his finances running dry, he tries in vain to sell the family house and ends up resorting to hilarious measures to enhance its property value.

programme.title: Diana's Wedding
programme.desc: Through the eyes of Diana, we witness the rollercoaster ride of both her parent’s and Irene’s marriages. To both girls, they have the worst parents in the world. But at the end of the day, which of the couples remain strong and which fall apart ?

programme.title: The Golden Dream
programme.desc: Juan, Sara and Samuel, all 15 years old, flee from Guatemala towards the USA. On their journey through Mexico they meet Chauk, a Tzotzil indian who does not speak Spanish and has no official documents. They believe they will find a better world beyond the USA-Mexico border but they run into a harsh reality.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Procession
programme.desc: Marlene Stöhr is shot by a crossbow during the legendary “blood procession” with over 3000 horses and is on life support. Right before she was shot, she saw a precious racehorse presumed dead years ago. Two detectives are called to investigate.

programme.title: Wonderland
programme.desc: Helena is a divorced woman who has lost faith in love. Her best friend Ulli persuades her into spending Christmas at a quaint and secluded farm. They meet the charismatic farm owners, Tuure and Unna, and bond over life’s troubles – and silver linings.

programme.title: Watchtower
programme.desc: Haunted by a tragedy, Nihat has isolated himself as a warden of a remote watchtower. He meets Seher, a hostess, and finds himself compelled to strike a companionship with her. Through their partnership, they find solace and hope in one another.

programme.title: The Winchesters S1 9
programme.desc: When Vampires make their way into Lawrence, Carlos corrals the gang to find out why. Latika provides vital information when John gets a scary glimpse into the future.

programme.desc: The gang flashes back to 2010 as Leonard tries to remember where he kept a potentially valuable investment.

programme.desc: It's foul play when the guys work stadium security! Then, the guys contaminate evidence during a crime scene investigation class. Plus, tonight's loser develops multiple personality disorder when opening for Legends in Concert.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 13
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Q and Murr head to the casino to see if they can play their cards right as Blackjack dealers. Then they team up for a complex guessing game in the park and polish strangers' footwear to an imperfect shine. Tonight's loser takes a pounding on the mound at a Brooklyn Cyclone's game, but it's a mystery lover who is delivering the blows.

programme.title: The Mentalist S7 10
programme.desc: Jane takes extreme measures as the FBI team tries to apprehend a deadly gang of armored car robbers before their desperation to remain free costs more innocent people their lives.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 06
programme.desc: Sheldon goes up against WIL WHEATON for the role of the new Professor Proton, while Penny steps in to take care of Halley when Bernadette & Howard are laid up on bed rest.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 07
programme.desc: Sheldon and Bert collaborate on a research project, despite Sheldon's embarrassment. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette coach Raj on how to navigate his relationship with Ruchi.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 08
programme.desc: Leonard and Howard enlist Barry Kripke (JOHN ROSS BOWIE) to help after they learn Sheldon betrayed them by working with the military behind their backs.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 09
programme.desc: The gang flashes back to 2010 as Leonard tries to remember where he kept a potentially valuable investment.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S11 10
programme.desc: Sheldon & Amy develop a unique system to eliminate stress from wedding planning. And Raj "breaks up" with Howard after realizing he's hurting his confidence.

programme.title: DC's Legends Of Tomorrow S6 12
programme.desc: When the Legends have to travel the old-fashioned way, Gary suggests playing a murder mystery game to pass the time… but Constantine makes the game more interesting.

programme.title: Container Wars S2 9
programme.desc: The competition hits a fever pitch when a container from south of the border lands at the Port of Los Angeles. But when unexpected surprises are discovered inside, will the party be over?

programme.title: Container Wars S2 10
programme.desc: The biggest auction on the planet sails to the middle of the Pacific Ocean when a mysterious container is dredged up from the bottom of the sea. Royal rumors spark golden expectations, but how could have any of the waterlogged loot survived?

programme.title: Container Wars S3 1
programme.desc: The bidders are back and the competition is fiercer than ever! Mo & Ty set their sights on a container from Mexico, but could everything inside be damaged goods? The Israelis pin their hopes on a mysterious wooden crate, and bids go through the roof on a one-of-a-kind open-air container.

programme.title: Container Wars S3 2
programme.desc: Mo and the Israelis partner up on a container from Africa, but will their alliance result in fool's gold? Matt attacks the competition for a can full of Chinese goods, but it could blow up in his face. And later, things take a bizarre turn when a bunch of strange items from an odd collector spark an intense bidding war

programme.title: Container Wars S3 3
programme.desc: Four containers, straight from the Big Apple, make their way to Long Beach, CA. A can full of broken dummies generates some serious buzz, while a billionaire's unclaimed goods have everyone seeing dollar signs. Plus, a one-of-a-kind auction that includes the container itself.

programme.title: Friends S6 6
programme.desc: The guys and the women prepare for big changes in their living arrangements. Monica and Rachel reminisce--and it's not all good memories.

programme.title: Friends S6 7
programme.desc: Chandler learns how obsessively neat Monica is when he attempts to do her a favor. Joey desperately tries not to flirt with his sexy new roommate. Phoebe's running style embarrasses Rachel.

programme.title: Friends S6 8
programme.desc: Suave Joey is as confident as usual while preparing to make love with Rachel for the first time. Ross goes to a spray-on tanning salon but fails to follow the simple directions properly.

programme.title: Friends S6 9
programme.desc: On Thanksgiving, Chandler tries to gain favor with Monica's parents--but an old secret involving Ross causes problems. Undomestic Rachel's dessert proves intriguing.

programme.title: Friends S6 10
programme.desc: Joey plots the perfect opportunity to kiss Janine on a televised New Year's Eve dance show. Ross and Monica resurrect their dorky high school dance routine for the broadcast.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 8
programme.desc: Join the festivities with 20 of the most pinheaded partiers ever to make the scene. From wild bachelorettes to a drunk Santa and more than you ever wanted to know about butt chugging. With crazy commentary from Danny Bonaduce and our celebrity cast,plus hot comics like Billy Kimball and Brendon Walsh.

programme.desc: Wild Boy - Part 1 - A traveling sideshow, run by Dr. Joshua McQueen, features the “Wild Boy of the North” as its main attraction.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S11 Ep12
programme.desc: Say No More - Lieutenant Curt Collins comes to the 4077th with a leg injury resulting from his heroic actions during a recent battle. A fat embolism takes the young soldier’s life and Hawkeye is left with the unpleasant news of telling the soldier’s father, General Collins. The General react with shock and anger and Hawkeye sees that, for perhaps the first time, the grim reality of war has touched the old soldier. Meanwhile, Hot Lips gets laryngitis and must cancel her plans to meet with a doctor that she has had her heart set on for some time. Charles, while disapproving of her choice in men, does Hot Lips an uncharacteristic good turn by arranging for the doctor to visit her at the 4077th. Hot Lips, already speechless, is also pleasantly surprised.

programme.desc: Friends and Enemies - One of Potter’s oldest friends, Col. Woody Cooke of I-Corps, is amongst the wounded who arrive at the 4077th. Cooke's wounds are minor but there are a lot of serious casualties amongst his men. When Hawkeye and B.J. make the discovery that the men were injured due to Cooke’s error they break the news to Potter. Potter is angered and refuses to believe them until he investigates the story and finds it is true. When he confronts Cooke about the incident, Cooke asks Potter to cover the whole thing up for him. Potter refuses and loses his oldest friend but he also realizes what good friends he has in Hawkeye and B.J.

programme.desc: Little Old Lucy - Mr. Mooney orders Lucy to masquerade as an elderly lady to be the date of Cornelius Heatherington Jr., president of the chain of banks the redhead works for. Problems occur when it turns out the 85 year old bank executive is a swinger and commences to chase the "elderly" Lucy.

programme.title: Remington Steele S1 Ep09
programme.desc: In the Steele of the Night - When a highly successful, but not well liked, private investigator throws a reunion party for all his former associates he ends up with a broken neck.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit S6 Ep06
programme.desc: Conscience - A young boy disappears from a birthday party, and is later found dead. As the detectives investigate, the pool of suspects gradually shrinks, until the evidence eventually points in an unexpected direction.

programme.title: Small Wonder S4 Ep14
programme.desc: Riches to Rags - Vicki invents a miracle laundry cleaner.

programme.title: Buffy The Vampire Slayer S2 Ep17
